short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a search box to bottom of 'following' list on Twitch.tv which filters list to easily find the user you are searching for.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds an extra search box to Twitch.tv for to make it easier to find users you follow. You simply start searching and the user you search for will be put at the top of your following list.
